inputParameter.description: Selects one of the ADC chips on the board (0 = CS0 and 1 = CS1)
inputParameter.name: adc_chip

inputParameter.description: Selects one of the channels of the ADC chip to be read out
inputParameter.name: adc_channel

inputParameter.description: Number of ADC values to acquire to compute a mean and spread
inputParameter.name: loop_count

outputParameter.description: Mean of the ADC values distribution in count units
outputParameter.name: adc_mean_counts

outputParameter.description: Spread of the ADC values distribution in count units
outputParameter.name: adc_rms_counts

outputParameter.description: Maximum ADC value read in count units
outputParameter.name: adc_max_counts

outputParameter.description: Minimum ADC value read in count units
outputParameter.name: adc_min_counts

outputParameter.description: Mean of the ADC values distribution in millivolts or milliamp units
outputParameter.name: adc_mean_mvolt_or_mamp

outputParameter.description: Spread of the ADC values distribution in millivolts or milliamp units
outputParameter.name: adc_rms_mvolt_or_mamp

outputParameter.description: Maximum ADC value read in milivolts or miliamp units
outputParameter.name: adc_max_mvolt_or_mamp

outputParameter.description: Minimum ADC value read in millivolts or milliamp units
outputParameter.name: adc_min_mvolt_or_mamp
